description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 6M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 3.2M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 3M.
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

In the absence of drawings, it has been determined in line with A.4 (2)(b) and (3)(b) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended) that the developer has not provided a elevation drawing indicating the site and the proposed development and has provided insufficient information to enable the authority to establish whether the proposed development complies with, the conditions, limitations or restrictions applicable to development permitted by Class A which exceeds the limits in paragraph A.1(i). 
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The proposed materials have not been demonstrated to be similar in appearance to the existing dwellinghouse, therefore the proposal would not accord with condition A.3(a) of Class A Part 1 Schedule 2 of the Town and Country (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
